item.description:
Join us for a special Pre-Thanksgiving dinner at the Lansdowne Pub, Boston. The Lansdowne is creating a special Thanksgiving dinner just for our meet up group!


The dinner will feature:

Roast Turkey w/ Gravy

Apple Sausage Stuffing

Roasted Acorn Squash

Mashed Potatoes

Brussel Sprouts

House Made Cranberry Sauce

Warm Apple Crumble Cake w/ Whipped Cream

Dinner and dessert is $25, not including tax/tip.


Join for a wonderful evening- relax, enjoy a delicious dinner, meet new and friendly people and celebrate the season. This will be a great night!

Other meet up groups will be invited to attend. The Lansdowne needs an accurate headcount 2 days before the event, so be sure to update your RSVP if your plans change. "Maybe" RSVPs will be considered a "No", 2 days prior.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Celebrate the Holiday, Special Pre-Thanksgiving Dinner!
